text.front:
HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE FOR RAJASTHAN AT
JODHPUR
S.B. Civil Writ Petition No. 6693/2021
Naganaray Stones, Through Its Proprietor Sanjay Singh S/o
Sultan Singh, Aged About 32 Years, R/o Abhaygarh Rajputon Ka
Baas, Setrawa Tehsil Dechu District Jodhpur (Rajasthan).
----Petitioner
Versus
1. State Of Rajasthan, Through The Joint Secretary,
Department Of Mines (Gr. II), Government Of Rajasthan,
Secretariat, Jaipur.
2. The Director, Directorate Of Mines And Geology, Khanij
Bhawan, Shastri Circle, Udaipur 313001, Rajasthan.
3. The Mineral State Trading Corporation Limited (Mstc), Site
Office Cf/02, First Floor, Nehru Place Complex, Tonk Road,
Jaipur 302015, Rajasthan.
4. The Assistant Mining Engineer, Mines And Geology
Department, Balesar District Jodhpur.
5. Khuman Singh S/o Vikram Singh, R/o Tehsil Dechu
District Jodhpur (Rajasthan).
----Respondents
For Petitioner(s) : Mr. Kuldeep Vaishnav
For Respondent(s) : Mr. DS Jasol
Mr. Mahaveer Singh {All through
Cisco Webex App}
JUSTICE DINESH MEHTA
Order
text.body:
12/05/2021
Mr. Vaishnav, learned counsel for the petitioner submits that
in view of the subsequent development, the petition has been
rendered infructuous.
Dismissed accordingly.
Stay petition also stands dismissed.
(DINESH MEHTA),J
23-Amar/-
